root.name: Biomotor Unitron
root.description: Biomotor Unitron was the first RPG game released for the Neo Geo Pocket Color handheld system. It is a similar RPG game to Pokemon and Monster Rancher. The game has players collect robots and robot parts in place of pocket monsters and then take part in battles through an easy to use menu system.

similar_games.game: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue/Red Rescue Team
